sent.orig: Objective To explore the current management strategy and effect of damage control operation(DCO)for severe pancreatic trauma.
sent.trans: 目的总结损伤控制剖腹术(dam age control laparotomy,DCL)治疗严重胰腺损伤的经验。

sent.orig: DD-Direct Damage. This is a spell that does all of its damage in damage over time.
sent.trans: 指的是造成直接伤害的攻击魔法，伤害效果在瞬间发生。

sent.orig: Fire Shield: Applies a damage shield returning 50% of melee damage dealt back upon damage dealer.
sent.trans: 烈火盾牌：应用盾牌伤害，返回50%的近战伤害到袭击者身上。

sent.orig: Basing on the scanning, density damage increment, pore damage increment and total damage increment are defined.
sent.trans: 提出了密度损伤增量、空隙损伤增量和总损伤增量的概念。

sent.orig: To prevent unlimited expansion of mental damage system, the certain restrictions of mental damage is inevitable.
sent.trans: 为防止对受害人精神利益的保护无限扩大，对违约精神损害赔偿进行一定的限制也是不可避免的。
